titles.title: Ensuring Access to West Los Angeles Veterans Affairs Easement Funds Act of 2019

To authorize the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to credit applicable medical facilities accounts at the West Los Angeles Campus of the Department of Veterans Affairs in Los Angeles, California with revenues received pursuant to the use of easements at the Campus.
Ensuring Access to West Los Angeles Veterans Affairs Easement Funds Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary:
Ensuring Access to West Los Angeles Veterans Affairs Easement Funds Act of 2019
This bill requires that funds received by the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) in connection with the use of an easement or right-of-way at the VA's West Los Angeles Campus in Los Angeles, California, be treated as revenue to be used exclusively for the renovation and maintenance of the land and facilities at the campus.
